summary: P57 Category Stabilization Testing - 19/19 backend tests passing, frontend wizard verification complete
critical_code_review_comments: Migration report format is correct - has title, timestamp, conflict count, scope-based section
ORDER_INDEX_ALREADY_USED error code properly returned with 400 status for duplicate sort_order
VEHICLE_SEGMENT_NOT_FOUND error code properly returned with 400 status for unknown segment
Vehicle segment link-status is case-insensitive as required
context_for_next_testing_agent: P57 stabilization features verified: module normalization (emlak->real_estate, vasita->vehicle, blank/invalid->other), migration report exists at /app/docs/CATEGORY_ORDER_MIGRATION_REPORT.md, unique index uq_categories_scope_sort active, POST category returns 400 + ORDER_INDEX_ALREADY_USED for duplicate sort_order, GET /order-index/preview works correctly, vehicle segment link-status is case-insensitive, vehicle create returns 400 + VEHICLE_SEGMENT_NOT_FOUND for invalid segment, vehicle segment unique per country working. Frontend wizard shows module dropdown (Emlak/Vasıta/Diğer), Sıra field is editable, vehicle segment is free text input with Master Data Linked badge.

features_verified.vehicle_segment_link_status: case-insensitive - car/CAR/Car all return same result
features_verified.vehicle_segment_unique_per_country: verified - same segment in same country returns 400
features_verified.frontend_wizard_sira_field: editable number input with preview check
features_verified.frontend_wizard_vehicle_segment: free text input with Master Data Linked badge
